/hr/ghcr.io-traefik-helm-traefik.title: traefik helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-traefik-helm-traefik.name: traefik
/hr/ghcr.io-traefik-helm-traefik.doc: Traefik is a HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer for microservices. It integrates with popular orchestration systems, such as Kubernetes, to provide seamless and automatic service discovery, load balancing, and proxying for your applications. Traefik is designed to be fast, efficient, and easy to use, making it a good solution for home lab environments. With Traefik, you can expose your applications to the internet with ease, providing remote access to your services from anywhere. Whether you're looking to host a personal website, run a web-based service, or simply provide external access to your applications.

/hr/ghcr.io-stakater-charts-reloader-sta.title: reloader helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-stakater-charts-reloader-sta.name: reloader
/hr/ghcr.io-stakater-charts-reloader-sta.doc: Reloader is a Kubernetes controller that watches changes for in configMaps and secrets, and can restart pods.
